panels.title: Bet Placements Average Duration in Ms - Racing Single
Bet Placements Average Duration in Ms - Racing Exotic
Bet Placements Average Duration in Ms - Racing Multiple

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| extend Bet_Replication_Time = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_replication_time)
| extend Bet_Count = toint(customDimensions.prop__bets)
| where isnotempty(Bet_Replication_Time)
| project Bet_Replication_Time, Bet_Count, timestamp, customDimensions
| order by Bet_Count, Bet_Replication_Time, timestamp desc
| summarize Average_BetReplication_Time = avg(Bet_Replication_Time), Average_Bet_Count = avg(Bet_Count) by bin(timestamp, 30s)

panels.title: End to End Bet Replication Time (Avg every 30sec)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| extend Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.tbs_bet_to_log_bet_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS)
| project timestamp, Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: Bet to LogBet Replication Time (Spanshot from Each Batch)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| extend LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.tbs_log_bet_poll_time)
| where isnotempty(LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS)
| project timestamp, LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: Bet Batch Poll and Map Time

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| extend RacingSingleBetPlacement = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__tbs_processing_time)
| where isnotempty(RacingSingleBetPlacement) and operation_Name == "RacingSingleBetPlacement"
| project timestamp, RacingSingleBetPlacement
| order by timestamp desc

traces
| extend RacingExoticBetPlacement = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__tbs_processing_time)
| where isnotempty(RacingExoticBetPlacement) and operation_Name == "RacingExoticBetPlacement"
| project timestamp, RacingExoticBetPlacement
| order by timestamp desc

traces
| extend RacingMultiplesBetPlacement = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__tbs_processing_time)
| where isnotempty(RacingMultiplesBetPlacement) and operation_Name == "RacingMultiplesBetPlacement"
| project timestamp, RacingMultiplesBetPlacement
| order by timestamp desc

traces
| extend RacingMultiFixedBetPlacement = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__tbs_processing_time)
| where isnotempty(RacingMultiFixedBetPlacement) and operation_Name == "RacingMultiFixedBetPlacement"
| project timestamp, RacingMultiFixedBetPlacement
| order by timestamp desc

traces
| where message has "Sending bet ids to fallback queue" 
| order by timestamp desc
| project operation_Name,timestamp,operation_Id 
| summarize Count = dcount(operation_Id) by bin(timestamp, 5s)

panels.title: Bet Domain Writer Fallback Message Count

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| where message has "Sending event to fallback" 
| order by timestamp desc
| project operation_Name,timestamp,operation_Id 
| summarize Count = dcount(operation_Id) by bin(timestamp, 5s)

panels.title: Bet History Writer Fallback Message Count
